name: Flower Pots
description:
Only works with 2 to 4 players

Goal: Plant flowers in patterns to make the most beautiful garden of all

  • Every pot can only be planted in during a certain season
  • You can plant over previously planted flowers
  • The flower you plant that season has to be part of the pattern for it to count
  • Once a flower is planted that pot and any that are apart of a pattern it makes are off limits for the rest of the season
  • If a pattern is made then it'll be replaced by a new pattern the next season
